title: New: HART – Anchor
body:
Stumbled across this completely by chance earlier this morning, the debut track from London’s **HART** aka Daniel Pattison, having rewired his earlier folk inspirations, into something more accessible and definitely more Hype Machine friendly.

With the sort of falsetto that propelled SOHN to critical acclaim, it’s a stirring, emotionally charged number, and undoubtedly going to open quite a few new doors for the Londoner.
